attractions.name: Historic Downtown Square
attractions.description: The heart of our city featuring boutique shops, restaurants, and monthly community events.

attractions.name: Riverside Park
attractions.description: A beautiful 50-acre park with walking trails, picnic areas, and a scenic river view.

attractions.name: City Museum
attractions.description: Explore our city's rich history through interactive exhibits and artifacts.

attractions.name: Mountain View Golf Club
attractions.description: An 18-hole championship golf course with stunning mountain vistas.

attractions.name: Farmers Market
attractions.description: Fresh local produce, artisan goods, and live music every Saturday morning.

attractions.name: Performing Arts Center
attractions.description: Hosting Broadway shows, concerts, and local theater productions year-round.

attractions.name: Science Discovery Center
attractions.description: Interactive science exhibits perfect for families and school groups.

attractions.name: Lakeview Trail
attractions.address: Trailhead at 600 Lakeside Drive, Your City, ST 12345
attractions.description: A 5-mile paved trail around the lake with breathtaking views and wildlife.
